Translation: to shut; to turn off; to close
have a high temperature (from illness); have a fever
(interj) Oh, sound made when expressing surprise; (idiom) used at end of sentence as an exclamation
to wish; to want; ready; willing (to do sth)
to give or have an injection
on time; before deadline; on schedule
to advise; to urge; to try to persuade; exhort
to stop; to give up; swear off; warn against
to open; to show (a ticket); to turn on; to switch on
to take apart; to tear open; to tear down; to tear apart; to open
